citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 17:44 on
23-JUL-18.
One partner was home, but explained that an inspection could not be conducted due to caring for a 7 month old
baby.
